title: Kuwait
summary: For more than 30 years, Citi has developed strong relationships with Kuwait's financial institutions and top corporations. For much of that time, Citi served its institutional clients in Kuwait from its regional headquarters in Bahrain, Dubai and London.
tag-2: Citi, the fourth foreign bank to set up a branch in Kuwait, offers corporate and investment banking services.
tag-3: For more than 30 years, Citi has developed strong relationships with Kuwait's financial institutions and top corporations. For much of that time, Citi served its institutional clients in Kuwait from its regional headquarters in Bahrain, Dubai and London.
